oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Letter from Pvt. William Joshua Thomas to his sister
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Letter from Pvt. William Joshua Thomas, Hale's Battery, Va. Lt. Arty., CSA, to his sister (name unknown) while Thomas was a prisoner at Camp Chase, Ohio. Thomas writes of his capture along with some four hundred other men. He reports on his good health and on everyday life in the camp.
